column4: I have a problem with a clean install of ubuntu 6.10 edgy. All kde programs crashes (amarok, kaffeine etc.). Giving this error message in the terminal:  DCOP aborting call from 'anonymous-5350' to 'kded'
kded: ERROR: Communication problem with kded, it probably crashed.
ERROR: Communication problem with kaffeine, it probably crashed.
just say you're question next time instead of just going "no one has a clue?" people are not going to go hunting up an down trying to find your question,
